# Test that we get an error when guide prose includes a directive to a non-existent step

! preguide gen -out _output
! stdout .+
stderr '^myguide/en.md:9:1: unknown step "step1" referened$'

-- myguide/en.md --
---
layout: rubbish
title:  "A bad title"
categories: beginner
---

# Step 1

<!--step: step1 -->
